scripts.paperz_ui:package: npm run paperz_ui:build && npm run paperz:build && npm run paperz:pack && cd crates/paperz_ui && ../../node_modules/.bin/bestzip ../dist.zip * && cd ../.. && hc web-app pack happs/paperz
scripts.paperz:build: cargo build -p paperz_integrity -p paperz_coordinator --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && cp $CARGO_TARGET_DIR/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/paperz_integrity.wasm ./happs/paperz && cp $CARGO_TARGET_DIR/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/paperz_coordinator.wasm ./happs/paperz
scripts.paperz:build-release: cargo build -p paperz --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && cp $CARGO_TARGET_DIR/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/paperz_integrity.wasm ./happs/paperz && cp $CARGO_TARGET_DIR/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/paperz_coordinator.wasm ./happs/paperz
scripts.paperz:pack: hc dna pack happs/paperz && hc app pack happs/paperz
scripts.paperz:run: hc sandbox generate happs/paperz && WASM_LOG=debug RUST_LOG=error RUST_BACKTRACE=full hc sandbox -f=9000 run -l -p 9999
scripts.paperz:redo: npm run paperz:build && npm run paperz:pack && npm run paperz:run
